response.overview: Billy Madison is the 27 year-old son of Bryan Madison, a very rich man who has made his living in the hotel industry. Billy stands to inherit his father's empire, but only if he can make it through all 12 grades, 2 weeks per grade, to prove that he has what it takes to run the family business.
response.tagline: To inherit his family's fortune, Billy is going back to school... Way back.
response.title: Billy Madison

results.name: I am the Smartest Man Alive! - Extended Preview
